item.title: Post: Patronize Me on Liberapay
item.description: Been skimming through ethical.net resources recently. Liberapay looks interesting: a patronage system like Patreon, but without reward tiers. More of a “keep doing — whatever the hell it is that you’re doing — it’s great” approach. So I joined of course. Give me money and I’ll keep doing exactly what I’ve been doing. Such a deal!
